author: ate
msg: SCXML-206: Ensure named events are never matched to event-less transitions

author: ate
msg: SCXML-206: External events must only be added to the event queue through SCXMLExecutor#addEvent, not (also) trigger them, as the state machine can/should only handle one invocation at the time (non-reentrant). The event queue processing with sequentially processed such added events one at a time.
